install.name: RokHeadRotator
install.author: RocketTheme
install.description:
RokHeadRotator Module

Version 1.0

RokHeadRotator is a Joomla! module that simple rotates between images and cross blends between them. Many settings are configurable

param.name: moduleclass_sfx
param.label: Module Class Suffix
param.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the module (table.moduletable), this allows individual module styling

param.name: imagePath
param.label: Images Directory
param.description: Location of images to be used in the rotation

param.name: appendTemplateStyle
param.label: Append Template Style
param.description: Append the template style to the image path. Eg images/stories/fruit/light/

param.name: altTag
param.label: ALT Tag
param.description: Text to use in the ALT tag for the images

param.name: imageStart
param.label: Images Start
param.description: Which image index to start on - default: 0;

param.name: sortCriteria
param.label: Sort Criteria
param.description: The sort criteria of the images files

param.name: sortOrder
param.label: Sort Order
param.description: The sort order of the images files

param.name: sortOrderManual
param.label: Manual Sort Order
param.description: Comma seperated list of images that describe the order - Example: image3.jpg,image2.jpg,image1.jpg - this will override Sort Criteria if set

param.name: imageDuration
param.label: Image Duration
param.description: Duration to stay on each image in ms

param.name: transDuration
param.label: Transition Duration
param.description: Time it takes to transition between images in ms
